name: Motiur Rahman
description: Motiur is a freelance writer and digital marketing specialist based in Stockholm, Sweden. He started his career as an SEO expert back in 2011 and found his interest in the crypto and blockchain space later in 2016. Since then, he has worked with several fintech companies as an author and meanwhile assisted them in promoting their business.
